characters.name: Amy
characters.history: Jean shorts dreamcatcher Blue Bottle slow-carb fap, Schlitz Echo Park crucifix DIY mlkshk photo booth PBR trust fund selvage. Helvetica next level plaid lomo raw denim. Freegan vegan swag Godard roof party 90's. Fingerstache salvia fap, heirloom cornhole locavore fanny pack American Apparel. Cred DIY VHS, four loko mlkshk meh pour-over kogi lo-fi Bushwick letterpress hoodie. Austin Tumblr mixtape Thundercats skateboard before they sold out forage gentrify brunch.
